    # 表格 Table

    二次封装 el-table ，兼容 element-ui 原属性、方法。

    # 基本使用

    查看代码 
    <template>
  <div class="demo-box">
    <d-table
      :header-list="headerList"
      :table-list="tableList"
    />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      headerList: [
        { prop: 'date', label: '日期' },
        { prop: 'name', label: '姓名' },
        { prop: 'phone', label: '电话' },
        { prop: 'address', label: '地址' },
      ],
      tableList: [
        { date: '2020-01-02', name: '小红', phone: 13548546235, address: '广州' },
        { date: '2022-02-02', name: '小白', phone: 15984563258, address: '云浮' },
        { date: '2018-11-03', name: '小黄', phone: 13521236954, address: '云南' },
        { date: '2021-05-12', name: '小绿', phone: 18542563259, address: '广西' },
        { date: '2011-01-02', name: '小蓝', phone: 13695478523, address: '深圳' },
      ]
    }
  },
}
</script>

    # 表格loading

    查看代码 
    <template>
  <div class="demo-box">
    <d-table
      :loading="loading"
      :header-list="headerList"
      :table-list="tableList"
    />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      loading: true,
      headerList: [
        { prop: 'date', label: '日期' },
        { prop: 'name', label: '姓名' },
        { prop: 'phone', label: '电话' },
        { prop: 'address', label: '地址' },
      ],
      tableList: [
        { date: '2020-01-02', name: '小红', phone: 13548546235, address: '广州' },
        { date: '2022-02-02', name: '小白', phone: 15984563258, address: '云浮' },
        { date: '2018-11-03', name: '小黄', phone: 13521236954, address: '云南' },
        { date: '2021-05-12', name: '小绿', phone: 18542563259, address: '广西' },
        { date: '2011-01-02', name: '小蓝', phone: 13695478523, address: '深圳' },
      ]
    }
  },
}
</script>

    # 空数据占位符

    查看代码 
    <template>
  <div class="demo-box">
    <d-table
      :header-list="headerList"
      :table-list="tableList"
    />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      headerList: [
        { prop: 'date', label: '日期' },
        { prop: 'name', label: '姓名' },
        { prop: 'phone', label: '电话' },
        { prop: 'address', label: '地址' },
      ],
      tableList: [
        { date: '2020-01-02', name: '', phone: 13548546235, address: '广州' },
        { date: '2022-02-02', name: '小白', phone: undefined, address: '云浮' },
        { date: '2018-11-03', name: '小黄', phone: 13521236954, address: null },
        { date: '2021-05-12', name: '小绿', phone: 18542563259, address: '广西' },
        { date: '2011-01-02', name: '小蓝', phone: 13695478523, address: '深圳' },
      ]
    }
  },
}
</script>

    # 复选框、索引

    查看代码 
    <template>
  <div class="demo-box">
    <d-table
      :header-list="headerList"
      :table-list="tableList"
    />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      headerList: [
        { type: 'selection', fixed: 'left', reserveSelection: true },
        { type: 'index', width: '100' },
        { prop: 'date', label: '日期' },
        { prop: 'name', label: '姓名' },
        { prop: 'phone', label: '电话' },
        { prop: 'address', label: '地址' },
      ],
      tableList: [
        { date: '2020-01-02', name: '小红', phone: 13548546235, address: '广州' },
        { date: '2022-02-02', name: '小白', phone: 13587452632, address: '云浮' },
        { date: '2018-11-03', name: '小黄', phone: 13521236954, address: '云南' },
        { date: '2021-05-12', name: '小绿', phone: 18542563259, address: '广西' },
        { date: '2011-01-02', name: '小蓝', phone: 13695478523, address: '深圳' },
      ]
    }
  },
}
</script>

    # 排序

    查看代码 
    <template>
  <div class="demo-box">
    <d-table
      :header-list="headerList"
      :table-list="tableList"
    />
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      headerList: [
        { prop: 'date', label: '日期' },
        { prop: 'name', label: '姓名' },
        { prop: 'age', label: '年龄', sortable: true },
        { prop: 'phone', label: '电话' },
        { prop: 'address', label: '地址' },
      ],
      tableList: [
        { date: '2020-01-02', name: '小红', age: 20, phone: 13548546235, address: '广州' },
        { date: '2022-02-02', name: '小白', age: 10, phone: 13587452632, address: '云浮' },
        { date: '2018-11-03', name: '小黄', age: 15, phone: 13521236954, address: '云南' },
        { date: '2021-05-12', name: '小绿', age: 30, phone: 18542563259, address: '广西' },
        { date: '2011-01-02', name: '小蓝', age: 22, phone: 13695478523, address: '深圳' },
      ]
    }
  },
}
</script>

    # 插槽slot

    查看代码 
    <template>
  <div class="demo-box">
    <d-table
      :header-list="headerList"
      :table-list="tableList"
    >
      <el-table-column slot="status" label="状态" prop="status" align="center">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{ scope.row.status ? "合格" : "不合格" }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column slot="operates" label="操作" align="center" fixed="right">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button type="text" @click="handleClick(scope.row)">查看</el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </d-table>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      headerList: [
        { prop: 'date', label: '日期' },
        { prop: 'name', label: '姓名' },
        { prop: 'phone', label: '电话' },
        { prop: 'address', label: '地址' },
        { slot: 'status' },
        { slot: 'operates' },
      ],
      tableList: [
        { date: '2020-01-02', name: '小红', phone: 13548546235, address: '广州', status: true },
        { date: '2022-02-02', name: '小白', phone: 13587452632, address: '云浮', status: false },
        { date: '2018-11-03', name: '小黄', phone: 13521236954, address: '云南', status: true },
        { date: '2021-05-12', name: '小绿', phone: 18542563259, address: '广西', status: false },
        { date: '2011-01-02', name: '小蓝', phone: 13695478523, address: '深圳', status: true },
      ]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleClick(row) {
      this.$message.success(row.name)
    }
  }
}
</script>

    # 属性

    参数 说明 类型 默认值
    header-list 表格头列表 array []
    table-list 表格列表 array []
    loading 表格loading状态 boolean false
    stripe 是否为斑马纹 boolean true
    placeholder 空数据占位符 string --

    ← 下拉选择框 Select 密码输入框 InputPassword →
